title: Crystal dust

properties.name: description
properties.value: Crystal dust is a Herblore tertiary ingredient used for creating divine potions. Divine potions provide the same level of stat boosts as the base potion they are made from, but stay boosted to their maximum for 5 minutes instead of the boost reducing by one level per minute as normal potions do.

content:
Not to be confused with Crystal dust (Song of the Elves) or Crystal dust (The Gauntlet).
Crystal dust
Released25 July 2019 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID23964

Crystal dust is a Herblore tertiary ingredient used for creating divine potions. Divine potions provide the same level of stat boosts as the base potion they are made from, but stay boosted to their maximum for 5 minutes instead of the boost reducing by one level per minute as normal potions do.

Crystal shard dust can be made by using a pestle and mortar on crystal shards, to create 10 dust per shard. One dust is used per dose (similar to amylase crystals in stamina potions); therefore, a single shard provides enough dust to create two and a half full divine potions.

[[File:Crystal dust detail.png|120px|left]]
'''Crystal dust''' is a [[Herblore]] tertiary ingredient used for creating [[divine potion]]s. Divine potions provide the same level of stat boosts as the base potion they are made from, but stay boosted to their maximum for 5 minutes instead of the boost reducing by one level per minute as normal potions do.

Crystal shard dust can be made by using a [[pestle and mortar]] on [[crystal shard]]s, to create 10 dust per shard. One dust is used per dose (similar to [[amylase crystal]]s in [[stamina potion]]s); therefore, a single shard provides enough dust to create two and a half full divine potions.
